page.title: 20Colonel Hignett
page.content: Colonel Hignett was in the army for 26 years and travelled to many countries.He has lived at The Grange, East Langton for 51 years.The Grange has 18 bedrooms and is expensive to heat.His favourite room is the "snuggery".There are three and a half acres and he hates gardening!He used to be co-driver of a racing car and has a maintainance workshop.He has a Queen Anne cupboard with a secret compartment.He has 3 cars:a Rolls Royce,a Humber and a Land Rover.He used to be Master of the Fernie Hunt. The Langtons have changed since he was young.More mechanical farming has meant that men who worked on the land have left and town people have moved into the village.The Colonel has just applied for planning permission to convert the stables and outbuildings into 8 dwellings.
